name: Flyonoid
summary: Flyonoid is a 2D platform game where hordes of alien scum attacked the little green planet. These monstrous creatures harassed three grasshoppers, stolen spots from the lady bug’s wings, but most importantly, they kidnapped all flies from planet Earth. All the flies are hidden on five different planets. Now the player has to find the flies and free them. There are objects during the game that help the player in his mission such as different weapons, the ability to fly, invisibility, and extra lives. Besides the monsters the character should also be careful from rocks, falling in water or from volcanoes. The game contains 20 levels that divided into five different worlds and each world contains 4 levels.
